summary: "The Tower" is a British TV crime show based on Kate London's books. It's about a London police officer, Sarah Collins, who investigates the mysterious deaths of a police officer and a young girl who fell from a tower block. The story gets more complicated when a witness goes missing. The show was mostly filmed in northwest England and received good reviews, with people praising Gemma Whelan's acting. Some critics noted issues with the sound quality. It first aired in November 2021.
title: The Tower (TV series)
